item.title: 英语到苗语项目

item.title: 中德翻译、专利翻译/编辑工作、Trados
item.description: Job posted on ProZ.comLanguages: Chinese to German各位译员朋友们，新年好！最近我公司在招募中译德，德译中兼职笔译译员，项目详情如下：项目类型：笔译项目语言对：中文译德语，德语译中文（擅长其中一个方向即可）项目工具：Trados项目内容：专利，偏技术专利类型项目要求：有专利方面翻译的经验至少3年以上，会使用Trados。自由译者优先考虑。状态：有正在进行中的项目，项目稿件量不定，偶尔来稿。如果您有意向应聘，烦请分享给我您的报价和简历。谢谢。

item.title: 韩国文案编辑/AIGC 审查项目正在进行，数量相当大

Technical documentation (Chinese-English) B. MKT documentation (Chinese-English/English-Chinese)Job requirements:A. Technical documentation: 3 years or above translation experience in IT-related fields, or majoring in IT, specializing in cloud computing translation.B. MKT documentation: 3 years or above translation experience in IT-related fields, or majoring in IT, with flexible language skills, specializing in MKT, and familiar with cloud computing-related content. Subtitle translation experience is preferred.C. Freelancer Only.Project process: Resume screening (experience confirmation) --- Free test draft --- Test draft passedEmail: [email removed]

item.title: 英语-荷兰语、Trados、法律、GLodom
